name: PertussisTestPanelsForBordetellaPertussisAndBordetellaParapertussisNucleicAcid
title: Pertussis (Test Panels for Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bordetella pertussis Bordetella parapertussis nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Test Panels for Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis nucleic acid),(Exclusion Criteria: Respiratory panel e.g. Biofire Assay)
